H0.text: Mosses are classified as belonging to which part of the plant kingdom. Thallophyta

H1.text: Mosses are classified as belonging to which part of the plant kingdom. Pteridophyta

H2.text: Mosses are classified as belonging to which part of the plant kingdom. Spermatophyta

H3.text: Mosses are classified as belonging to which part of the plant kingdom. Bryophyta

A4.text: Mosses are now regarded as Division Bryophyta
